In his keynote at the DLD Conference in Germany, Google's outgoing chief executive Eric Schmidt announced his company's intent to expand its European presence. Our businesses are doing very well around the globe, and as a result I'm happy to announce we'll be adding 1,000 new employees in Europe and make some significant investments, explained Eric Schmidt . I have forgiven Michael Vick . From this day forward, I will no longer bash Michael Vick on my Facebook page or in this column. There will be no more references to "scum" or a piece of trash who shouldn't be given the privilege of playing quarterback in the NFL.
